title: I have You Under Popeye's Chicken
itunes:title: I have You Under Popeye's Chicken
description:
Wednesday 10/24- Today on the show we opened up the phone lines for a chance for our listeners to shoot their shot at their crush, and this particular listener was in a polyagmous relationship, well at least that is what she thought, until she found out that her name was under Popeyes Chicken. Moreover, the "Shoot Your Shot" made us raise the question to see if any of our listeners would do a polygamous relationship, so we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Megyn Kelly for her blackface comments.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Wednesday 10/24- Today on the show we opened up the phone lines for a chance for our listeners to shoot their shot at their crush, and this particular listener was in a polyagmous relationship, well at least that is what she thought, until she found out that her name was under Popeyes Chicken. Moreover, the "Shoot Your Shot" made us raise the question to see if any of our listeners would do a polygamous relationship, so we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Megyn Kelly for her blackface comments.
